text: The Sisypheans is the fourth studio album by Australian band Xylouris White. It was released on 8 November 2019 under Drag City. The album is named after the Greek God, Sisyphus. ==Critical reception== The Sisypheans was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 77, based on 5 reviews. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Drag City (record label) albums
title: The Sisypheans
